verses.roman:
rāya kahe,--"vṛndāvana, muralī-niḥsvana
kṛṣṇa, rādhikāra kaiche kariyācha varṇana

synonyms: rāya kahe—Rāmānanda Rāya says; vṛndāvana—the place named Vṛndāvana; muralī-niḥsvana—the vibration of Kṛṣṇa's flute; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; rādhikāra—of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; kaiche—how; kariyācha varṇana—you have described.
translation: Śrīla Rāmānanda Rāya further inquired: "How have you described Vṛndāvana, the vibration of the transcendental flute, and the relationship between Kṛṣṇa and Rādhikā?
